Method Summary
 void debugRoom()
          Used for debugging.
 void enterRoom()
          Performs all the necessary functions for when a room is entered.
 int getContents()
          getContents - returns the integer for the contents of the room 0-700 for a monster 700-850 for nothing 850-998 for an item 999 for an exit.
 void leaveRoom()
          Performs all the necessary functions for when a room is left.
 void openEast()
          Sets the variable that says the east door is open.

Constructor for objects of class Room

Method Detail

debugRoom

public void debugRoom()
Used for debugging. Outputs variables and values.

enterRoom

public void enterRoom()
Performs all the necessary functions for when a room is entered. Changes variable isOccupied to true. Generates room contents.

getContents

public int getContents()
getContents - returns the integer for the contents of the room 0-700 for a monster 700-850 for nothing 850-998 for an item 999 for an exit.

leaveRoom

public void leaveRoom()
Performs all the necessary functions for when a room is left. Changes isOccupied to false.

openEast

public void openEast()
Sets the variable that says the east door is open.

openNorth

public void openNorth()
Sets the variable that says the north door is open.

openSouth

public void openSouth()
Sets the variable that says the south door is open.

openWest

public void openWest()
openWest - Sets the variable that says the west door is open.

printRoom

public void printRoom()
Prints the room on the screen
